task.title: Downloading a file with instantiated VNF info

taskbody.context:
Overview
This procedure provides instructions on how to assign the instantiated VNFâ€™s information to a specified parameter. Before you begin:
Before beginning this procedure, ensure that you are logged in to the CBAM GUI.To assign the VNF information:

step.cmd: In the CBAM GUI, click the options button with three horizontal lines, and then select Virtualized Network Functions. The Virtualized Network Functions pane with the list of created VNFs appears.
In the Virtualized Network Functions pane, click the appropriate VNF. The Virtualized Network Function Details window appears.
In the Virtualized Network Function Details window, click the Instantidated VNF Info tab.

info.p: The Instantidated VNF Info pane appears.

step.cmd: In the Instantidated VNF Info pane, click the Download button represented by the downstream arrow icon.

info.p: The file vnf-<VNF name>-instantiated-info.json is downloaded.

step.cmd: Save the file vnf-<VNF name>-instantiated-info.json to the $AUTO_HOME directory.
